name: Banjex's Basics in Stylish Gods
description:
Welcome to Banjex's Basics in Stylish Gods! In this Baldi's Basics mod, your Bambi OC goes to the Stylish Gods House, but then, Banjex turned the house into a school. Will you escape the Stylish Gods School?

Tip: Use the Banjex Soda when Banjex is too close to you to beat the mod, and it's best to use items to win easily.
